description: Tall vertical on left, half vertical on top right, the right vertical then continues in a curve to connect to the bottom of the left vertical. Top is closed by a horizontal. Three vertical lines off top horizontal. Capped by 'table'.

features.description: How many vertical lines come off the top?
Which side is the curve on? 0 = left, 1 = right
What is the table decorated with? 0 = nothing, 1 = small vertical line
